articles.content: Twitter and Reddit have been filled with patients and doctors sharing their experiences and hypotheses over the past few days, including John Donoghue, a 71-year-old emeritus physics professor in Amh… [+6010 chars]

articles.title: Moderna to file for EUA of COVID-19 shot for very young kids by April end - Reuters
articles.description: Moderna (MRNA.O) plans to submit an application to the U.S. health regulator for emergency use authorization (EUA) of its COVID-19 vaccine among kids between the ages of six months to five…
